ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We have come to you with what they had doubts about.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have come to you with news," they said, "of what your people doubt;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "Nay, we have brought to you that concerning which they have been in doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "We have come to you about the matter which the (unbelievers) have rejected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “In fact we have brought to you the matter which these people doubted.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Nay, we have come to you with that (torment) which they have been doubting."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Nay, we have come to you with that about which they disputed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Nay, but we have brought thee that concerning which they were doubting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Nay, but we bring thee that concerning which they keep disputing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "No, but we bring you news about what they disputed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: nay! we have come to thee with that whereof they have been dubitating.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Indeed, we bring you what they used to doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Yea, we have come to thee to accomplish that of which they doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Nay, we have come to you with that (torment) which they have been doubting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No' they replied: 'We bring you (news) of that concerning which they were doubting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We bring you what they have doubts about.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:63] They said, ‘Rather, we have come to you because of that which they, your people, used to doubt, namely, the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Nay, but we bring thee that concerning which they keep disputing) the torment in which they are in doubt,
